a.seq, a.type spotType, a.name, a.zipCode, a.address, a.addressDetail, a.sido, a.tel, a.openTime, a.closedTime, a.adultPrice, a.childPrice, a.detailText, ROUND(avg(c.starRating),1) starRating, COUNT(c.review) cnt, d.path, d.type, d.uuidName, b.spotSeq spot_seq, b.seq spotUsr_seq
